text: Alfred Gager (10 February 1942 – 10 January 2022) was an Austrian footballer. He played in six games for the Austria national football team from 1962 to 1963. Gager also played for FC Admira Wacker Mödling. He was born in Vienna, Austria. Gager died on 10 January 2022 in Vienna, at the age of 79.Austria Wien trauert um Alfred Gager fk-austria.at ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Austrian footballers Category:Sportspeople from Vienna Category:FK Austria Wien players
title: Alfred Gager
